Posts.EditableText:
Hello!

Very new to squiffy here! 

I've recently created a game, from downloadning the client for Windows 7. Now, I want to be able to demonstrate the game on another computer, but how the heck do you even start it? 

I've pressed build, and recieved all the files; gamename.sq, story.js, index.html etc. But none if the files open the game, except story, wich just displays all text, but have no clickable links.

I'm obviously missing something...?
Posts.HTML:
Hello!

Very new to squiffy here!

I've recently created a game, from downloadning the client for Windows 7. Now, I want to be able to demonstrate the game on another computer, but how the heck do you even start it?

I've pressed build, and recieved all the files; gamename.sq, story.js, index.html etc. But none if the files open the game, except story, wich just displays all text, but have no clickable links.

I'm obviously missing something...?

Posts.EditableText: Open index.html with your internet browser (chrome, mozilla, opera, safari, ...) and that´s it.
Posts.HTML: Open index.html with your internet browser (chrome, mozilla, opera, safari, ...) and that´s it.

Posts.EditableText: Yeah, it works on my stationary but not on my laptop. It probably had an outdated browser... Thanks anyway!
Posts.HTML: Yeah, it works on my stationary but not on my laptop. It probably had an outdated browser... Thanks anyway!
